00024 void ObjectModelNormalPlane::computeRandomModel (int &iterations, Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, bool &isDegenerate,
00025                 bool &modelFound){
00026 
00027         std::vector<int> samples;
00028         std::vector<int> selection;
00029         getSamples(iterations,selection);
00030 
00031         if (selection.size () == 0){
00032                 isDegenerate = false;
00033                 modelFound = false;
00034                 return;
00035         } else {
00036 
00037                 isDegenerate = true;
00038 
00039         }
00040 
00041         if (!computeModelCoefficients (selection, model_coefficients)){
00042                 modelFound = false;
00043                 return;
00044         } else {
00045                 modelFound = true;
00046                 return;
00047         }
00048 }
00049 
00050 void ObjectModelNormalPlane::getSamples(int &iterations, std::vector<int> &samples){
00051 //      points = inputPointCloud->getPointCloud();
00052 
00053 
00054         samples.resize (3);
00055         double trand = inputPointCloud->getSize() / (RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00056 
00057         // Get a random number between 1 and max_indices
00058         int idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00059         // Get the index
00060         samples[0] = idx;
00061 
00062         // Get a second point which is different than the first
00063         do
00064         {
00065                 idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00066                 samples[1] = idx;
00067                 iterations++;
00068         } while (samples[1] == samples[0]);
00069         iterations--;
00070         // Get the values at the two points
00071         Eigen::Vector4d p0, p1, p2;
00072         // SSE friendly data check
00073         p1 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getZ(), 0);
00074         p0 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getZ(), 0);
00075 
00076         // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p1 and p0
00077         p1 -= p0;
00078 
00079         Eigen::Vector4d dy1dy2;
00080         int iter = 0;
00081         do
00082         {
00083                 // Get the third point, different from the first two
00084                 do
00085                 {
00086                         idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00087                         samples[2] = idx;
00088                         iterations++;
00089                 } while ( (samples[2] == samples[1]) || (samples[2] == samples[0]) );
00090                 iterations--;
00091 
00092                 // SSE friendly data check
00093                 p2 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getZ(), 0);
00094 
00095                 // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p2 and p0
00096                 p2 -= p0;
00097 
00098 #ifdef EIGEN3
00099                 dy1dy2 = p1.array () / p2.array();
00100 #else
00101                 dy1dy2 = p1.cwise () / p2;
00102 #endif
00103                 ++iter;
00104                 if (iter > MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR )
00105                 {
00106                         cout<<"[SampleConsensusModelNormalPlane::getSamples] WARNING: Could not select "
00107                                         "3 collinear points in"
00108                                         <<  MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR <<"iterations!";
00109                         break;
00110                 }
00111                 iterations++;
00112         }
00113         while ( (dy1dy2[0] == dy1dy2[1]) && (dy1dy2[2] == dy1dy2[1]) );
00114         iterations--;
00115 
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 bool ObjectModelNormalPlane::computeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &samples, Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients){
00120 
00121         assert (samples.size () == 3);
00122 
00123         Eigen::Vector4d p0, p1, p2;
00124         // SSE friendly data check
00125         p0 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getZ(), 0);
00126         p1 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getZ(), 0);
00127         p2 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getZ(), 0);
00128 
00129         // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p1 and p0
00130         p1 -= p0;
00131         // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p2 and p0
00132         p2 -= p0;
00133 
00134         // Avoid some crashes by checking for collinearity here
00135 #ifdef EIGEN3
00136         Eigen::Vector4d dy1dy2 = p1.array () / p2.array();
00137 #else
00138         Eigen::Vector4d dy1dy2 = p1.cwise () / p2;
00139 #endif
00140         if ( (dy1dy2[0] == dy1dy2[1]) && (dy1dy2[2] == dy1dy2[1]) )          // Check for collinearity
00141                 return (false);
00142 
00143         // Compute the plane coefficients from the 3 given points in a straightforward manner
00144         // calculate the plane normal n = (p2-p1) x (p3-p1) = cross (p2-p1, p3-p1)
00145         model_coefficients.resize (4);
00146         model_coefficients[0] = p1[1] * p2[2] - p1[2] * p2[1];
00147         model_coefficients[1] = p1[2] * p2[0] - p1[0] * p2[2];
00148         model_coefficients[2] = p1[0] * p2[1] - p1[1] * p2[0];
00149         model_coefficients[3] = 0;
00150 
00151         // Normalize
00152         model_coefficients.normalize ();
00153 
00154         // ... + d = 0
00155         model_coefficients[3] = -1 * (model_coefficients.dot (p0));
00156 
00157         return (true);
00158 }

00160 
00161 void
00162 ObjectModelNormalPlane::getInlierDistance (std::vector<int> &inliers, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,  std::vector<double> &distances) {
00163         // Needs a valid model coefficients
00164         assert(model_coefficients.size () == 4);
00165 
00166         distances.resize (inliers.size());
00167 
00168         for (size_t i = 0; i < inliers.size (); ++i)
00169         {
00170                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the plane normal as the dot product
00171                 // D = (P-A).N/|N|
00172                 distances[i]=fabs (model_coefficients[0] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getX() +
00173                                 model_coefficients[1] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getY() +
00174                                 model_coefficients[2] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getZ() +
00175                                 model_coefficients[3]);
00176         }
00177 }

00179 
00180 bool
00181 ObjectModelNormalPlane::doSamplesVerifyModel (const std::set<int> &indices,
00182                 const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, double threshold)
00183 {
00184         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 4);
00185 
00186         for (std::set<int>::iterator it = indices.begin (); it != indices.end (); ++it)
00187                 if (fabs (model_coefficients[0] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getX() +
00188                                 model_coefficients[1] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getY() +
00189                                 model_coefficients[2] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getZ() +
00190                                 model_coefficients[3]) > threshold)
00191                         return (false);
00192 
00193         return (true);
00194 }

00196 
00197 void
00198   ObjectModelNormalPlane::selectWithinDistance (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, double threshold, std::vector<int> &inliers){
00199 
00200     assert (model_coefficients.size () == 4);
00201     if (!this->normals && this->normals->getSize()!=this->inputPointCloud->getSize())
00202     {
00203       cout<<"[ObjectModelNormalPlane::getDistancesToModel] No input dataset containing normals was given!";
00204       return;
00205     }
00206 
00207     Eigen::Vector4d coeff = model_coefficients;
00208     coeff[3] = 0;
00209 
00210     // Check against template, if given
00211     if (epsAngle > 0.0)
00212     {
00213       double angle_diff = fabs (getAngle3D (axis, coeff));
00214       angle_diff = fmin (angle_diff, M_PI - angle_diff);
00215       if (angle_diff > epsAngle)
00216       {
00217         inliers.resize (0);
00218         return;
00219       }
00220     }
00221     if (epsDistance > 0.0)
00222     {
00223       if (fabs (-model_coefficients[3] - distanceFromOrigin) > epsDistance)
00224       {
00225         inliers.resize (0);
00226         return;
00227       }
00228     }
00229 
00230     int nr_p = 0;
00231     inliers.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00232     // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the plane
00233     for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00234     {
00235       // Calculate the distance from the point to the plane normal as the dot product
00236       // D = (P-A).N/|N|
00237       Eigen::Vector4d p = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX(),
00238                   (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ(), 0);
00239 
00240       Eigen::Vector4d n = Eigen::Vector4d (this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getX(),
00241                   this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getY(),
00242                   this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getZ(), 0);
00243 
00244       double d_euclid = fabs (coeff.dot (p) + model_coefficients[3]);
00245 
00246       // Calculate the angular distance between the point normal and the plane normal
00247       double d_normal = fabs (getAngle3D (n, coeff));
00248       d_normal = fmin (d_normal, M_PI - d_normal);
00249 
00250       if (fabs (this->normalDistanceWeight * d_normal + (1 - this->normalDistanceWeight) * d_euclid)
00251                   < threshold)
00252       {
00253         // Returns the indices of the points whose distances are smaller than the threshold
00254         inliers[nr_p] = i;
00255         nr_p++;
00256       }
00257     }
00258     inliers.resize (nr_p);
00259 
00260 }
00261 
00262 void
00263   ObjectModelNormalPlane::getDistancesToModel (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00264                   std::vector<double> &distances){
00265 
00266     assert (model_coefficients.size () == 4);
00267 
00268     if (!this->normals && this->normals->getSize()!=this->inputPointCloud->getSize())
00269     {
00270       cout<<"[ObjectModelNormalPlane::getDistancesToModel] No input dataset containing normals was given!";
00271       return;
00272     }
00273 
00274     distances.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00275 
00276     Eigen::Vector4d coeff = model_coefficients;
00277     coeff[3] = 0;
00278 
00279     // Check against template, if given
00280     if (epsAngle > 0.0)
00281     {
00282       double angle_diff = fabs (getAngle3D (axis, coeff));
00283       angle_diff = fmin (angle_diff, M_PI - angle_diff);
00284       if (angle_diff > epsAngle)
00285       {
00286         distances.resize (0);
00287         return;
00288       }
00289     }
00290     if (epsDistance > 0.0)
00291     {
00292       if (fabs (-model_coefficients[3] - distanceFromOrigin) > epsDistance)
00293       {
00294         distances.resize (0);
00295         return;
00296       }
00297     }
00298 
00299     // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the plane
00300     for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00301     {
00302       // Calculate the distance from the point to the plane normal as the dot product
00303       // D = (P-A).N/|N|
00304       Eigen::Vector4d p = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX(),
00305                   (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ(), 0);
00306 
00307       Eigen::Vector4d n = Eigen::Vector4d (this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getX(),
00308                   this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getY(), this->normals->getNormals()->data()[i].getZ(), 0);
00309       double d_euclid = fabs (coeff.dot (p) + model_coefficients[3]);
00310 
00311       // Calculate the angular distance between the point normal and the plane normal
00312       double d_normal = fabs (getAngle3D (n, coeff));
00313       d_normal = fmin (d_normal, M_PI - d_normal);
00314 
00315       distances[i] = fabs (this->normalDistanceWeight * d_normal + (1 - this->normalDistanceWeight) * d_euclid);
00316     }
00317 
00318 }
